content: During these volatile times, we have been able to aggressively grow our topline, with improved pricing, volume and mix implement new and flexible pricing strategies that are showing early signs of success in offsetting record-level input costs diversify our portfolio with continued strong growth in air and industrial filtration, release liners and premium packaging and strengthen our position with customers by leveraging a global supply chain that addresses their local needs, reformulating product chemistries to meet customer demand, and launching new products that expand their addressable markets and provide sustainable alternative solutions.
